title: Mexico : housing prices 2018 to 2019
summary: The statistic shows the housing prices Price in Mexico from Q1_2018 to Q2_2019 .
In Q2_2019 , 800.98 thousand smartphones were shipped in Mexico .
gold: This statistic shows the average housing price in Mexico from the first quarter of 2018 to the second quarter of 2019.
In the second quarter of 2019 , Mexicans paid on average 1.07 million Mexican pesos to acquire residential property.
Compared to the same period of the previous year , the nominal price increased by more than 30 percent .
